name: Steam Eagles (Max Harris)
description:
All you do is break, pickup, and build pipes.  There is no game, it's just a toy. 

Controls:

transporter controls

- right/left arrows : move

- up arrow: jump

- break pipes: left control

builder controls

left mouse - build pipes

wasd - move

jump - space

Previous Assets Used from Steam Eagles.  Also here's a fun gas simulation you can try which didn't make it all the way to Unity for this Jam.  

Controls for the gas simulation are same as this game, except additional controls are 

  • z - suck up gas
  • x - release gas

The story behind this game/toy's development...

So this game was revived twice.  I tried to design the experience we'd be building to be tailored to the teammates and what they said they wanted to work on most; which was storytelling.  So for the first half of the jam, I tried very hard to make sure everybody had something that they'd be excited about to work on.   However, it turns out that they were not working on anything the whole week and I'd been preparing a unity project for assets which did not actually exist :(  Well so that was a huge bummer, and I was resolved this let project to stay buried.  But the general support from the community convinced me to try to get something published.  Of course I got sick the last 2 days of the jam... so this is what we ended up with.
